meanings.definition: A large grouse found in northern forests.
meanings.sent1: The capercailzies strutted proudly through the forest.
meanings.sent2: Many capercailzies were spotted in the dense woods.
meanings.sent3: Why did the capercailzies bring a map to the forest?
meanings.sent4: The capercailzies stood out in the forest like a king among his subjects.
meanings.sent5: The majestic capercailzies with its colorful feathers was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of capercailzies flying overhead.
meanings.sent2: The hunters were excited to spot the capercailzies in the trees.
meanings.sent3: The capercailzies decided to have a party in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The capercailzies filled the sky like a cloud of feathers.
meanings.sent5: The forest echoed with the calls of the capercailzies.
